Text.Page:
I need help weakening Thulsan forces through attrition. Eliminate {@LinkCreature:27#10#Thulsan slayers}, {@LinkCreature:27#11#arcanists}, {@LinkCreature:27#8#berserkers}, {@LinkCreature:27#12#cleavers}, and {@LinkCreature:27#9#dreadweavers} and collect their insignias.

Report to Vlara when your mission is complete.
Thulsa's forces will be defeated so long as we have soldiers like you. Well done.
Monies cannot be dispensed without proof of death. Apologies.
